Uses of Package
xxl.core.math.queries

  • Packages that use xxl.core.math.queries 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric provides several methods based on nonparametric statistics.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.histograms
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.histograms provides some functionality concerning histograms.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels provides concrete kernels and abstract modellings.
  • Classes in xxl.core.math.queries used by xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric 
    Class and Description
    WindowQuery
    Classes implementing this interface are able to consume a window query returning the selectivity or any other associated numerical value to the given window.
  • Classes in xxl.core.math.queries used by xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.histograms 
    Class and Description
    PointQuery
    This interface provides the support for the estimation of point queries respectively the association of a numerical value with a point query.
  • Classes in xxl.core.math.queries used by xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels 
    Class and Description
    WindowQuery
    Classes implementing this interface are able to consume a window query returning the selectivity or any other associated numerical value to the given window.
